StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateOsAmmoCanLi.]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @NwaID int ,@AmmoCanLi. int ,@AmmoCanLi.Date date ,@LastEditBy varchar(15) )
AS
DECLARE @P.ID int
SELECT PFT_ID INTO #UpdateList FROM MCRISS.dbo.PFT WHERE NWA_ID = @NwaID AND CAST(PFT_Date as DATE) = @AmmoCanLi.Date
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM #UpdateList) BEGIN INSERT INTO MCRISS.[dbo].[PFT] ([NWA_ID] ,[AmmoCanLi.] ,[PFT_Date] ,[rowguid] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@NwaID ,@AmmoCanLi. ,@AmmoCanLi.Date ,NEWID() ,@LastEditBy ,GETDATE() ) END ELSE BEGIN
UPDATE MCRISS.[dbo].[PFT] SET [AmmoCanLi.] = @AmmoCanLi. ,[PFT_Date] = @AmmoCanLi.Date ,[USER_LOGIN] = @LastEditBy ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GETDATE() FROM #UpdateList u INNER JOIN MCRISS.[dbo].[PFT] p ON u.PFT_ID = p.PFT_ID
END
DROP TABLE #UpdateList
